tldr: The `rand_os` crate is deprecated and no longer actively maintained, as `OsRng` is now part of `rand_core`. Consider upgrading to `rand_core` 0.5.1 or higher.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `rand_os` package from your application. Please take a look at `rand_core` instead.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
